      • init

        protected void init(DataTableSpec spec,
                    int size)
        Specified by:
        init in class Statistic
        Parameters:
        spec - the datatable spec of the data table to compute stats on.
        size - the amount of columns, of the set columns or of the default columns.

      • consumeRow

        protected void consumeRow(DataRow dataRow)
        Called for each row in the data table. Implementations should loop over the Statistic.getIndices() array, to receive the DataCells of interest. Be aware that the data cell could also be the missing cell. An example is shown below. 
         protected void consumeRow(final DataRow dataRow) {
     for (int i : getIndices()) {
         DataCell cell = dataRow.getCell(i);
         //... do computation
     }
 }
        Specified by:
        consumeRow in class Statistic
        Parameters:
        dataRow - the data points
